discoveries.name: You have discovered the J/Psi!
discoveries.description: Congratulations! You have discovered the J/Psi resonance (see wikipedia).

discoveries.name: You have discovered the W boson!
discoveries.description: Congratulations! You have discovered a new gauge boson: the W (see wikipedia).

discoveries.name: You have discovered the Higgs boson!
discoveries.description: Congratulations! You have discovered the Higgs boson, the particle that is responsible for giving mass to other particles (see wikipedia).

discoveries.name: You have discovered supersymmetry!
discoveries.description: Congratulations! You have discovered supersymmetric particles, which are the extremely massive counterparts of ordinary matter (see wikipedia).
